content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### Power generation system at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position 106.5, -32.5)
- Boiler (position 111.5, -32.0)
- Steam engine (position 117.5, -30.5)
- Pipe group (position 107.5, -34.5)
- Pipe group (position 105.5, -32.5)

### Transport system at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position 40.5, -83.5)
- Transport belt (position 63.5, -53.5)
- Transport belt (position 64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a fuel source before use.
- Ensure that boilers have a fuel source before use.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before use.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items before use.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before use.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a fluid source before use.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the required ingredients before use.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
